class.name: SortingGroup3D
class.brief_description: Sorting group node for transparent 3D objects.
class.description: A node that allows grouping transparent 3D objects to sort them as a single entity. Sorting groups can be nested withing other sorting groups.

method.name: add_visual_instance
method.description: Adds a [VisualInstance3D] to be sorted within the sorting group.

method.name: remove_visual_instance
method.description: Removes a [VisualInstance3D] from the sorting group.

method.name: update_all_groups
method.description: Updates all sorting groups immediately if there are any changes, instead of waiting for the next idle time.

members.member: If [true] and this sorting group is nested, it won't be sorted within its parent sorting group. This can be useful when you want to add a child to an entity, but you don't want it to be sorted as part of the entity.
The sort order of this sorting group relative to other sorting groups and transparent objects at the same depth.
